_aLatestUpdates._sText:
-added flying seagull on the coast

-fixed an issue where it was possible to go outside the map on a T-spawn

-fixed an issue when you could see nodraw texture on a museum roof on the bombsite B

-minor prop fixes on T-spawn

-removed invisible walls on seaside

-added trigger hurt in the water

-improved invisible walls

-added props on the right side of T spawn designating a closed passage

-improved piles of stone appearance

-added new decorations on CT spawn

-minor texture fixes

_sText:
de_lesina is a bomb defuse map inspired by beautiful city in a south Italy. The main attraction of this map is Lesina Cathedral recreated in CS:S, located near the coast.

The map structure itself is a slightly modified copy of the local streets.

Have fun!

I would like to thank those people who leave their feedback, it helps me a lot to improve the map.
